H0.text: Which religious figure had a horse named Kanthaka. Mahavira

H1.text: Which religious figure had a horse named Kanthaka. Krishna

H2.text: Which religious figure had a horse named Kanthaka. Zoroaster

H3.text: Which religious figure had a horse named Kanthaka. (Guatama)Buddha

A4.text: Accompanied by Chandaka and riding his horse Kanthaka, Gautama leaves the palace
